text:
/circle6 Begin plotting on the partograph only when active labour starts. Active labour starts 
when the cervical dilatation is 4 cm or more and the woman is having at least two good 
contractions every 10 minutes. 
/circle6 Record the cervical dilatation in centimeters every four hours.
/circle6 In this phase, cervical dilatation progresses by approximately 1 cm per hour and is oft en 
quicker in multigravidae.
MODULE I
45
Management of Normal Pregnancy, Labour and the Post-partum Period
/circl
